title: THE PROBLEM GANKING BOT WHEN THEY TURRET HUG AND DON'T HELP
body:
Self explanatory...

WHY OH WHY DOES BOT LANE GO AFK WHEN I PING TWICE FROM MID FOR ASSISTANCE TO GANK THEIR LANE...

THEN THEY ARE SO TERRITORIAL THEY GO AFK WONDERING WHY I'M IN THEIR LANE...

FIGHTING 1VS2 INSTEAD OF 3VS2? 


BECAUSE I AM THE NOOB?

replies.body: If you main mid, you're automatically trash

> [{quoted}](name=Trump Meme,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YfbJ84nc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-18T06:14:33.285+0000)
>
> If you main mid, you're automatically trash

Why because I can actually control the map?

no because you are trying to force a gank on a lane that is very obviously trying to tell you to gtfo and is doing everything in their power to make you not gank, and you still try for the gank and then think that they are in the wrong for not helping.

generally i do this when there's a feeding mid laner who's come to feed me lane opponent and stepped on 7 wards and his gank path is the most predictable shit ever. 

my line of thought is this: this guy has been hovering around my lane for 7 minutes now trying to do 5 different approaches. also he's on a ward. now, either the enemy mid is already here, the enemy jungler is already here, or this guy is so pathetic he's gonna die to the enemy bot before i manage to do anything.

gnak? naa, i'll pass on that. go home.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YfbJ84nc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-18T06:55:09.414+0000)
>
> Why because I can actually control the map?

No, because you always try to take my blue
